DOC.brief_summary: This trial is conducted in Europe. The purpose of the trial is to investigate the effect of insulin detemir on weight change in overweight and obese patients with type 2 diabetes.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Insulin Detemir Versus Insulin NPH on Weight Change in Overweight and Obese With Type 2 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: HbA1c: 7.511.0% BMI: 2540 kg/m2 Treatment with any OAD (Oral Antidiabetic Drugs) except metformin
